reviews.text: AMAZING FOOD. Great price and portion size is more than sufficient.

I've (American descent ) been wanting to try this place and stopped by today there were only Two people waiting that have already ordered , I stood there waiting for a good five minutes with no acknowledgment and/ or greeting meanwhile with no exaggeration there were at least six staff behind the counter congregating I even made eye contact with with one of the staff and still was ignored  .Will not be getting my Dollar

Finally a Haitian restaurant with good customer service!! Food is good, i had different plates from there. I had the rice and meat balls, with the Haitian macaroni and cheese, Their fried pork, Their fried fish. I also recently trid their bakery and the cake and ice cream is everything!

The food is not so  bad but Marinad $1 for 1
Akra $1.50 for one is too expensive. Also how you put green salad with mayi moulin  ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èsame bowl for a medium meal ridiculous

Pi move restoran.
Moun kap vann yo pa genyen 1/% etik.
Mwen rele nan telephone , mwen mande eske sa posib pou yo kite yon Tasso San sosis, san marinad. Mwen vl√© selman bannann ak vyann.
Li reponn b√®l Wi.

Lem al chache Tasso, mwen fin peye.
Lem ouvril, yo plin li ak sosis, yo plin li ak akra ak marinad. Epi yon bann Zo ak gr√®s.
Lem di se pa sa mwen te mande. Li dim ooo jetel sim pa vl√©‚Äôl. Epi yo tou fini avew..

I asked a friend for a recommendation of good Haitian Food in Brooklyn and they recommended this place. It took me 45 minutes to get there. I made an order online while I was 15 minutes out from the location. It said it will take anywhere from 20 to 30 minutes for my order to be complete. Upon arrival at the location, my order was still not ready. I stood in the store for about 20 minutes additional minutes while they completed my order. When I receive my food, one of the items that I ordered was not correct forcing me to go back in and spend another 15 minutes while they corrected my order. By that time, my appetite had already gone, but I had already paid as well so what choice did we have? To proceed when I begin eating my food, the macaroni salad, unfortunately was flavorless. The fish I can say was great. The turkey was not as expected and lacked flavor. The service at the location was par. And unfortunately, I do not feel like it was worth my time, travel, or money.
They sell some of the best pate kode in town!

I really wanted to eat a "lalo" but I was really disappointed, I couldn't even eat it, the lalo was too liquid, had no taste, with two small pieces of meat and two crab legs... anyway waste of time and money and it will be the last time
I ordered goat tassot  from them it was delicious I enjoyed  it.
Lambi is good  not hard
The food is cold , rice is hard and very expensive service is horrible
There is a Language Barrier but the Great food and service makes up for it. The Have PikLz in a Jar and the Sell Lambi aka Conch!

I usually order from them and it always has been good but this time the Fried Pork (Griot) was dry I almost choked on it, and dont get me started on the Macaroni Salad, it was dry as well the macaroni was hard and had no taste it just tasted like its been there for more then a few days.
Very poor customer service, messed up my order and when I came back to the store, started to argue instead of fixing my order. I‚Äôm never going back to this place.

I have ordered here twice. I got both pate kode chicken one time and herring the other. i would say that the herring tasted 10xs better than the chicken. It‚Äôs only the meat & eggs with onions. it‚Äôs pretty big. the chicken doesn‚Äôt have the same flavor as the herring. I didn‚Äôt have a bad experience since i have only ordered that from them.
Li te bon avan kounye yo vann mwn bouyon d√≤mi  üò°‚Ä¶
The food was left over the skin of the oxtail was still there the rice taste like left overs
Good food , yummy ,,,
The food here used to be excellent, over the past, it's gotten horrible.  A 5 mins car ride home, my rice was cold, tassot was cold and hard.   Smh

I hope someone read this and make the proper modifications. The food used to taste amazing, it used to have flavor and not rushed, the black rice is not djon djon and these people are cutting corners . If you‚Äôre going to disguise black rice atleast make it flavorful. Food was bland and cold. Today is my final day I refuse to go back.
I use to like ordering from this restaurant but after my recent experience ever again. I order banana with chicken and the amount of hair that I found was ridiculous. NEVER AGAIN
I ordered fritay fried plantains and fried turkey this is what I got. Nou better f√® manje yo pi clean bannan nan fri nan yn lwil Sal ki gen move santü§Æü§Æü§Æ‚Ä¶
Great customer service, tasty food.Best Haitian restaurant
The food here used to be amazing now I don't know what type of food that it is. I just purchased fish and rice I'm really trying my best to eat it. The rice and fish are both tasteless.
I found human Hair in my dumpling

That black short lady who claimed she is the manager she was sooooo rude to me today because they gave me my food without telling me the macaroni wasn't ready and when I catch that she told me ohhh I have to wait 20 mins. I told her that is not my fault if you didn't have it why you didn't tell me that in the first place. You gave me my food without it and now when I noticed it you asked me to wait 20 mins and I ask for something else instead she goes on to say ohhh we don't give substitute and she was like you wanna wait you don't wanna wait have a great day. While it was your fault not giving me my macaroni that I paid for I wasn't gonna notice that if I didn't check my food. Very bad customer service because of that lady.

I used to come here all the time. But today was the last time. If you are not Haitian they treat you horrible. They don‚Äôt speak English which is okay but once I started speaking in English they gave me a huge attitude, and if you try to ask a question they give you a huge attitude. I‚Äôm not coming back. I urge others not to come. It‚Äôs hot in there and everyone has an attitude and they have Two lines but nobody recognizes that I just waited 20 minutes for them to say they don‚Äôt have fried pork. If you can go somewhere else you‚Äôll have a better experience.  DO NOT GO HERE!
The food isn‚Äôt bad at all. If you like haitian food, then you will enjoy this place.

I came to buy food not for you to stare at me up and down with an attitude and tell me you don‚Äôt have diri blan and sauspwa at 2pm. These workers have no customer service at all. Treating paying customers like we on a food line for a kitchen soup.
I ordered griot and it was shredded( I  didn‚Äôt like this) instead of a whole piece.  The wait was long and not very customer friendly for those waiting for food.

The food here is intensely gross tasting, saying this as a haitian, there was no care in packaging my food, my plate of macaroni was placed in the bag right on top, literally directly on the Patties I got, food was over priced and I couldn't keep down any of it, I threw up alot of it. Don't eat here!

The food is lousy I ordered a plate of rice and beans with goat upon arrival at home I found a long piece of hair in the rice. It was disgusting to find a hair in your food. They should watch how they serve and wear proper clothing to protect any hair or other stuff falling into the food. I will not be ordering from them again.

I told your people I‚Äôm allergic to yam üç† they stil put it on my plate and your employees don‚Äôt serve the meal properly,as you can see this is the food and I didn‚Äôt event start I‚Äôm really Angry üò°
I've never been there....
Bon S√®vis,yo resevwa moun byen epi mange yo bon

The food is superb! But‚Ä¶. The workers aren‚Äôt very friendly to people who aren‚Äôt Haitian from my experience. I‚Äôm not. But I frequent this place.  The big light skin guy needs to fix his attitude. I asked if they had pikliz and he dry stared at me and did not respond. As a returning customer I expect better customer service.
I ordered lanbi white rice...all I taste in the lanbi is a very hot üî• pepper and the rice is not cook..people work hard for their money....
Zozo‚Ä¶..?
If you like a lote of pepper in your food and I mean hot peppers. You will like this place.
I wish I could give this place a zero.
Wasted my money buying a large tassot fritye and they gave me some griot without telling me
Yo the people are so freaking rude. Fanm nan f√® k√≤msi se mande mun vin mandel. Yo mare machw√® yo. Yo pa gen bon jan menm...
The food was good I got griot. They didn‚Äôt have black rice , the staff was okay not the most welcoming but that‚Äôs Caribbean people for you smh.
Zero customer service , garbage net, mwen sot achet yon fritay la se jet√© mwen jetel, menm bannane fri a mpaka mange, fenmen restaurant si nou paka jwenn moune pou fe mange yo
Had Haitian food for the first time and I must say the black rice wasüî•. Potato salad was pretty decent, and chicken in sauce was good too.
Customer Service is horrible..Food is great I get Griot which I believe is  awesome but fried too hard.

I had the griot and I thought it was good. I got meaty pieces, not just fat and bone. However I'm not Haitian and when my Haitian sister-in-law tried it, she said it was lacking acid. It came with a good portion of rice and a side and 2 pieces of fried bannann. The fried bannann was too thick, not crispy enough and not salty enough.

My Haitian husband had the patties. However these patties don't look like any Haitian patty I have ever seen or tasted and we've been together almost 20 years. They look more like gigantic empanadas with creative fillings (like a whole boiled egg). He can't even say if they at least tasted good because he can't get over the shock of finding a boiled egg in the filling.

The service was terribly, terribly slow...and it was around 2:30 in the afternoon on a Monday.

The fritay is so good! It's packed with everything and its all fresh and delicious. The Lalo meal is amazing. The Lalo tastes so fresh as well as the serving size. I really enjoy their service. It does take a while. But that's to be expected. They have a lot of customers.
I ordered tassot they made the order wrong, and they did not want to give me a refund. The Uber driver also gave me somebody else‚Äôs order.

I‚Äôve been to this place 4 or 5 times now. Every time I have to wait 30+ minutes for my food even though the food is premade and is just sitting out there. Literally all they need to do is scooping the food into the container. And honestly the food isn‚Äôt that good. The chicken is so dry. And the pork is so hard to chew. I wouldn‚Äôt even go here a second time if it‚Äôs not so close to me.

Today I decided to give it another try. The cashier got my order wrong. I told her and she just brushed me off and started talking to the next customer.

I‚Äôm never going back again.
Amazing Caribbean food with great flavors

Great place for American and West Indians Food, the place is nice with an authentic creole design. Food Quality is Awesome nevertheless the service a bit slow. To Avoid being waiting please come come earlier to enjoy your eating out experience.

My brother in law told me the place has great fritalle..so we tried it and the food was great. I ordered and was told  20 minutes was the wait time I returned in 30 min food was ready. I felt the cashier was a bit impatient with me but otherwise the food was worth it.

I really wish I can give no stars . The staff in this restaurant is so RUDE & Unprofessional!! 1st of all I ordered three plates of griot fritay for 44$ and in the plate I only received griot and plantains where was the rest of the food? what got to me was they had the nerve to get mad when my mother confronted them about it, but when we got home to eat the food and it was not good at all!

Im just disappointed with Kreyol Flavor! (THUMBS DOWN)

Overpriced for the portions they give and they are always "sold out" of the tassot (fried goat). How are you sold out at 11am? No matter what time I go there, they're always "sold out" I was subsequently told by the cashier they don't make‚Ä¶

Very great food, enjoyable and tasty.
Only problem is when they don't give you the sause in the cup, mine open in the bag and it was all messed up,lol. But yeah i recommend it üëå
Mmmm so tasty! Quick delivery and fresh. Loving this spaghetti

Food is OK But if you‚Äôre looking for good customer Service  please stay home cuzz they treat customers like trash, bad attitudes. Time for Haitian Businesses start hiring strangers not Haitian.The Skinny Black girl shouldn‚Äôt be in the Front desk.
It was a great experience, As a big fine of rice i can say that i was impressed.food was delicious and you can get side dishes, just one thing:try not to get fatüòâüòÇ‚Ä¶
THE LADY HAD ME STANDING ON LINE FOR 7 MINUTES TO BE EXACT. WHILE YOU WALKED AROUND ON HER PHONE. WHEN I FINALLY SAID MISS CAN I ORDER SHE SAID ON THERES NO FOOD
Food was good. Just remember if you order rice, that will be the main course. You'll get more of that then anything else. It might be a cultural thing...lol.

The food is decent but however if you decide to eat from there do not call and order something your better off going inside they have horrible service over the phone they had me on hold for 20 mins and I heard them taking care of all the‚Ä¶
